docs.text: Welcome to the rclref develoment site rclref is a reference implementation of a key-value store built on riak-core-lite. rclref was created as part of Google Summer of Code 2020 with the aim of exercising various APIs of riak-core-lite with documented support. Development languages and tools The code is fully written in Erlang OTP > 21. License rclref is released under Apache License, Version 2.0 Table of Cotents
